doc.title: Karaena
doc.plot: Filmed using a combination of live action and stop-motion puppetry. A young man sits alone in his apartment watching television and taking care of his bonsai plant. Two neighbor children come in and persuade him to eat one of the fruits from the tiny tree. The fruit causes him to have a series of bizzare hallucinations, from which he wakes up to find his precious plant missing.
